title: The In Game Music, Should be Each Unique Champions Themed Music
body: I Find that I personally Like to Play My Champions Music While I Play i.e. Vi, Ekko, Hec. I find that the champions music pumps me up and I get into the character and game better. Does anyone else find this? or do this? or is it just crazy me? aha I find it awesome and I think RIot should take into consideration to make it a passive sort of thing.

replies.body:
That would be nice, the in-game music is boring as shat.

At least the old SR's was, I haven't got around unmuting the new one when I was still playing, maybe it got better idk.

But yes, playing the champ's theme while you're playing as him/her is definitely nice.
listening to daylights end as {{champion:131}} ... i think id like that...
